name: serverx-angular
description: Deploy Angular applications to serverless environments using ServeRX-ts
author: Mark Florence

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && rimraf dist && tsc && cp -R src/model/ dist
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.dryrun: npm run build && node dist/index.js --app sample/app --deploy sample/deploy/aws.json --dryrun
scripts.sample:aws: npm run build && node dist/index.js --app sample/app --deploy sample/deploy/aws.json
scripts.sample:google: npm run build && node dist/index.js --app sample/app --deploy sample/deploy/google.json
